summation_rule: Sum all related GL accounts algebraically (respecting debit/positive and credit/negative signs). DO NOT coerce signs to positive. The calculation includes: Purchases + Purchase-related expenses - Purchase Returns - Discounts Received. The final total reflects net purchases.
additional_instructions:
*This note includes all purchase-related transactions:
- GL 6010/00000 PURCHASES (main purchases)
- GL 6012/00000 PURCHASES RETURN (reduces purchases, typically negative)
- GL 6014/00000 TRANSPORT CHG (adds to purchase cost)
- GL 6015/00000 CARRIAGE INWARD (adds to purchase cost)
- GL 6016/00000 PACKAGING MATERIAL (adds to purchase cost)
- GL 6018/00000 CUSTOM DUTY (adds to purchase cost)
- GL 6019/00000 LAB SERVICE & COMMISSIONING FEE (adds to purchase cost)
- GL 6017/00000 DISCOUNT RECEIVED (reduces purchases, typically negative)

IMPORTANT: This note uses ALGEBRAIC summation. Do not convert negative values to positive. Present the final amount as-is, whether positive or negative. All these GLs have Ind AS Minor 'Purchase of traded goods'.

NOTE: Opening Stock (GL 6000/00000) and Closing Stock (GL 6020/00000) should NOT be included in this note - they belong to Note 27 (Changes in Inventories).
